itemDescription: English rugby union footballer, cricketer and broadcaster (born 1955)

wikipedia_page.main: Alastair James Hignell  (born 4 September 1955 in Ely) is an English former rugby union international and cricketer, and broadcaster.

link_mentions.page: List of alumni of Fitzwilliam College, Cambridge

response: According to Alastair Hignell, in the aftermath of the first match against Japan, Allchurch was involved in a bar brawl after being struck on the head by an ashtray thrown by a drunken Japanese fan. He was named to the bench for the second match against Japan and made his England debut as a flanker against Tonga in the final match of the tour, scoring one try.
